display_long_description:
Welcome to an adrenaline-fueled, immersive gaming experience like no other - our Gorilla Tag fan game on quads! Prepare to dive into a virtual jungle where speed, strategy, and teamwork collide in a pulse-pounding adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Our meticulously crafted game offers a dynamic and thrilling gameplay experience that puts you right in the heart of the action. Picture this: swinging through intricately designed maps, leaping from platform to platform, and navigating obstacles with the agility of a gorilla. With an array of meticulously created maps, each offering its unique challenges and strategic possibilities, boredom is simply not an option.

What sets our game apart is the exhilarating multiplayer aspect. Gather your friends or team up with fellow players as you engage in heart-racing chases and strategize your moves to outmaneuver opponents. The seamless multiplayer functionality ensures that every pursuit, every escape, and every daring leap feels incredibly immersive and dynamic.

But it's not just about speed and agility; it's also about cunning tactics and clever maneuvers. Use the environment to your advantage, devise strategies to outwit your opponents, and showcase your skills as a master gorilla tag player.

Beyond the thrill of the chase, our game fosters a sense of community.


Also you have to be 13+ yrs old
